channel.title: Can i host a server on linux VPS?
channel.description:
Hi, i wish to start my own server im about to buy a vps hosting account, linux or windows but i dont no which one is better or if it will even work on linux, i do linux tends to be cheaper so im just asking for your guys opinions.
Also i have no idea in setting up a sever so if you would lke to help me i can compensate you with some paypal cash please add my msn praider143@hotmail.com
thanks alot guys

item.title: Can i host a server on linux VPS?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“RuneX-Gaming, post:2, topic:242176”]Stick with Windows mate if you’re not sure.

I’ve just bought a Windows one the other day, now trying to get my server online.[/quote]
No.

Windows VPS uses a lot of RAM and CPU just to run the OS in the first place. Linux OS’s usually use less resources therefore you can make the most out of your PC. Ask which OS they would use.

Read full topic
item.source: Can i host a server on linux VPS?
